ARABIC: قَالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئْتَ بِـَٔايَةٍ فَأْتِ بِهَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'If you have come with a Clear Sign produce it if you are telling the truth.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "If you have brought a sign then display it, if what you say is true."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Pharaoh said: if you have brought a sign, then bring it forth if you are truthful.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Pharaoh asked Moses to show his miracles if he was telling the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Firaun, “If you have come with a sign, then present it if you are truthful!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: [Fir`awn] said: "If you have come with a sign, show it forth, if you are one of those who tell the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: If you have come with a sign, then bring it, if you are of the truthful ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'If thou hast brought a sign, produce it, if thou speakest truly.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Pharaoh) said: If thou comest with a token, then produce it, if thou art of those who speak the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [Pharaoh] said, "If you come with a sign, then produce it, if you are telling the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: if thou hast brought a sign, forth with it then, if thou art of the truth-tellers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘If you have brought a sign, produce it, should you be truthful.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Pharaoh) said: "If indeed thou hast come with a Sign, show it forth,- if thou tellest the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Fir'aun (Pharaoh)] said: "If you have come with a sign, show it forth, - if you are one of those who tell the truth."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He answered: 'If you have come with a sign, show it to us if you are of the truthful'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “If you brought a miracle, then present it, if you are truthful.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Pharaoh] said, "If you have come with a sign, then bring it forth, if you should be of the truthful."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:106] Said he, Pharaoh, to him: ‘If you have come with a sign, as you claim, then produce it, if you are of those who speak the truth’, in this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Pharaoh) said: If thou comest with a token) with a sign, (then produce it, if you are of those who speak the Truth) and if you are indeed a messenger.
